com.safety4kids.game.Utils

Class SplashScreenLogo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.safety4kids.game.Utils.SplashScreenLogo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class SplashScreenLogo
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    This class creates a SplashScreenLogo object used in the IntroAnimation class. It contains methods and variables that alter it's positioning on the screen and it's alpha value, which is it's transparency.
    Author:
    Bill Bai, Erfan Yeganehfar Ms. Krasteva

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private float alpha
      The alpha value of the sprite.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle bottom
      This Rectangle instance control's it's positioning on the screen.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite
      The Sprite of the logo, which will be altered on the screen.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture
      The Texture that will be placed on the sprite, so it will be able to be altered.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SplashScreenLogo()
      This is the constructor, that creates the instance of SplashScreenLogo.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SplashScreenLogo

        public SplashScreenLogo()
        This is the constructor, that creates the instance of SplashScreenLogo. It initializes bottom, texture, sprite, alpha, and places the sprite at location 0,0.

    • Method Detail

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float x,
                        float y)
        This method allows you to set the position of the sprite. It alters the Rectangle associated with the sprite, and changes the location.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x-location of the sprite.
        y - The new y-location of the sprite.

      • fade

        public void fade()
        This method decreases the alpha value of the sprite, giving it a fading out appearance.

      • getAlpha

        public float getAlpha()
        This method returns the alpha value of the sprite.
        Returns:
        The alpha value of the sprite.

      • getX

        public float getX()
        This method returns the x-location of the sprite.
        Returns:
        The sprite's x-location.

      • moveRight

        public void moveRight(float delta)
        This method shifts the location of the sprite right. This is done by increasing the x-value of the sprite.
        Parameters:
        delta -

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
        Draws the sprite onto the screen.
        Parameters:
        spriteBatch - The SpriteBatch object to be drawn onto.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Overridden method from the Disposable interface. It disposes the texture, then calls the JVM's garbage collection. This is called reduce memory usage.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
